ComicInfo.Title: A Clause for Celebration; Wishful Thinking; That's My Wish, and I'm Sticking To It!; Hammer Time
ComicInfo.Summary:
A Clause for Celebration: B.A. stops Brian's character from becoming immortal but Brian still comes out with a bonus.
Wishful Thinking: Sara uses her wish to save Dave's character's life and Brian uses his wish to become immortal. B.A. tries to find a way to twist Brian's wish to have unintended consequences.
That's My Wish, and I'm Sticking To It!: Brian gains access to several wish spells and sells his fellow party members wishes at 10,000 gold pieces apiece. Bob and Dave use their wishes to disastrous results.
Hammer Time: Brian forces B.A. to re-evaluate a game decision, leading to Brian receiving a mighty weapon.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-12 17:17:15. [CVDB181799] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-14 06:54:26. [Issue ID 89659]
ComicInfo.Characters: Sara Felton,Pete Ashton,Bob Herzog,Crutch,Dave Bozwell,Brian van Hoose,Nitro Fergueson,Boris Alphonzo,Earl Slackmozer
ComicInfo.Teams: The Knights of the Dinner Table
